about_the_game:
BIT.TRIP Presents... Runner2: Future Legend of Rhythm Alien Soundtrack includes the following:

  • Runner2 Theme
  • Welkin Wonderland
  • Cloud Titans
  • Welcome To Brine Time
  • Cetaceous Old Saw
  • The Supernature
  • Superfunk
  • Sadds
  • Moldy Drops
  • BIT.TRIP
  • Re-Fusion
  • Jolly Frolic
  • Frank Engage
  • Deleterious Abscondee
  • Shake A Leg
  • I Am Only A Man
  • Credits
